cause.description:
The hysteria surronding the "Global Warming" issue has gone too far. It has made alot of people very rich by cultivating the fear it generates into profits. Most of these people are not even qualified to talk about these issues. Any unbiased true scientest would tell you that there is little or no prove to these alleged "dangers" to the earth.
1. Global Warming is NOT a serious issue
2. people who use it to their adavantage should NOT be ellected into office
3. Al Gore is a hypocrite
cause.mission: prove that global warming is not caused by humans or even occuring
cause.name: End the Hysteria
